ac-valhalla.name: Assassins Creed: Valhalla (PS4)
ac-valhalla.description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action-adventure video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft.

elden-ring.name: Elden Ring (PS4)
elden-ring.description: Elden Ring is an action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

soma.name: Soma (PS4)
soma.description: Soma is a survival horror video game developed by Frictional Games and published by 505 Games. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One in September 2015.
